div.div: Scratch is a free visual programming language with code blocks to create animations, digital stories etc.
Scratch opens directly on your web browser.
Chapter . How to start coding in Scratch
Easy steps to guide you in building your scratch project.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: Scratch is a free visual programming language with code blocks to create animations, digital stories etc.
Scratch was designed to provide free coding platform for young children. However, it is used by people of all age group. It is available in more than 70 languages. Learning is fun with Scratch.
div.div:
Some of the benefits using Scratch are:
Develop problem solving skills
Promotes computational skills
Creative thinking
Self expression and collaboration

div.p: Scratch opens directly on your web browser.
div.section: You need a Laptop or a Desktop.
Steps to help you start Scratch.

li.span: Open your web browser. Example: Chrome

li.div: The home page of Scratch application opens.

div.div:
Scratch Environment consists of three major sections:
Block Pallete
Coding Area
Stage Area

h1.span: How to start coding in Scratch

div.p: Easy steps to guide you in building your scratch project.
div.section:
Open the Scratch interface.
Get started with Scratch (on page )
Learn to build your first Scratch project using the code blocks.

li.span: Select Events to view the list of code blocks.
Drag and drop when clicked in the middle section.
Select Looks to view the list of code blocks.
Drag and drop say Hello! for 2 seconds below the previous block.
Select the Go flag on the top right section.

div.section: You have created your first program.
